channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter and Rubbish causing problem for the childrensas well as adultsand due to which residence are facing pest issue, 29th October
item.description:
There is rubish on the street and near the start of the stairs due to which it is difficult for children to walk through and resident are not even able to take toddlers down. It is a life treating situation for children as there is danger of them falling down and creating pest issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet Leaves and Litter, 29th October
item.description:
Both sides of Sutherland Road. Edmonton N9 are covered in leaves and litter which are very wet and slippery due to the recent rainfall. Please can we get street cleaning team to clear as there is a potential hazard for anyone walking across this and having accident. Pavements are completely covered.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Sutherland Road, Edmonton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crouch Croft, Coldharbour, London

item.title: Pedestrian lane to Heysham Lane, 28th October
item.description:
Chronic problem with lights out - reported a month ago by another person as #8255692. Urgent safety issue, both trip and fall as well as crime - three days ago a street robbery occurred in the dark a few hundred yards away on Redington Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Redington Gardens, West Hampstead, London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Fly tipped, 28th October
item.description:
More and more rubbish is being thrown and left accumulating on Kashgar road. The road has not been swept for weeks on end, one road sweeper goes up and down on their phone and not collecting anything. I will put video footage up to highlight where and what our council tax money is being spent on or should I say not on!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kashgar Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip rubbish, 28th October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ceres Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Antisocial behaviour lime bike.You have decided or have struct a deal with the Lime bike company allocating 3 car parking spaces in Osborne road which is an absolute nightmare for the residents. How can you justify this decision taking up car space for Lime bikes that pay no insurance, no road tax, and not paying for car parking permit like I am, why are privileged. This is also causing ASB especially at the weekend. Why have Hackney council given Lime preferential treatment I am sick of moving these bikes out of my way because of the outrages decision you've made. I have been a resident in Osborne road for 25 years and never experience such disruption. I have always owned a car and I have always paid from 2012 for a parking permit yet the nuisance bike get everything for free. I have asked in the pass to have a designated parking space with a very valid reason and guess what you refused but, now you give LIME BIKES FREE Parking which is causing a nuisance. Whoever, thought this was a good idea perhaps you should have this going on outside your own home and see how you like it. Lastly they are also leaving bikes near peoples cars I came out one day to find a bike learning on peoples cars. I THINK YOU SHOULD REMOVE THIS IDEA IMMEDIATELY. Other boroughs are scrapping them completed because of the nuisance these bikes are causing is seen on TV las week. Good morning Britain. I will be showing pictures of these bikes on Good Morning Britian and explaing to them what an issue it is causing in this cul-da-sac . The users leave the bikes anywhere they feel like it, I have had to personally move bikes in order to get passed when driving my car and when walking out of my front door. Friday and Saturday nights are worse than a week day. Is there a deal thats been made with the company to allow this prefe., 28th October
item.description:
Antisocial behaviour lime bike.You have decided or have struct a deal with the Lime bike company allocating 3 car parking spaces With the mayor of Hackney like lime bikes dumped outside her home. Is lime bites are causing nuisance.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mare Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Antisocial behaviour being caused by line bikes. Weekends are the worst over 28 line bikes dumped all over the place even leaning on residents, visitors vehicles causing damaged to their cars because bikes of being left in dangerous, inconsiderate way. What is the mayor of Hackney doing about this nuisance and anti-social behavior with these line bikes everywhere. I live in the area and I have motability issues, disabled and often have to try move lime bikes off my car or out the way. Lime bikes laying in public roads causing a hazard to other road users., 28th October
